articles.title: IRE vs IND: Sanju Samson remains in the reckoning for World Cup squad, says Saba Karim - India Today
articles.description: Saba Karim feels that Sanju Samson remains in the reckoning to be a part of the World Cup squad, especially if KL Rahul doesn't reach full fitness by that time. Samson has been selected as the backup player for the Asia Cup squad.
articles.content:
Saba Karim feels that Sanju Samson does remain in the reckoning for the ODI World Cup squad, especially if KL Rahul isn't fully fit.
